help-file.title: "GOD, GRANT" "GOD, REVOKE"
help-file.content:
Syntax: grant <player> <command>
"Grant" lets you grant a player a command normally above their level, until someone uses "revoke" to remove the ability. Be VERY careful in its usage. The grantable commands form a limited subset of god commands. You can only revoke a command that was previously granted.
